alert.note: Alert for Audubon; Carroll; Cass; Crawford; Sac (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 6:07AM CDT until July 12 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Cass County in southwestern Iowa... Audubon County in west central Iowa... Southwestern Sac County in west central Iowa... Crawford County in west central Iowa... Southwestern Carroll County in west central Iowa... * Until 645 AM CDT. * At 607 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Battle Creek to near Woodbine to Omaha, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Denison, Atlantic, Audubon, Manning, Griswold, Schleswig, Exira, Manilla, Elk Horn, Dow City, Charter Oak, Vail, Lewis, Kimballton, Westside, Kiron, Deloit, Ricketts, Brayton and Marne. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 50 and 63. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
